resources.string: Yes, it\'s Noteify by Stellar Software!
No that would be unheard of.
Does Austin want to progress to the next Android development course?
I would really like to be accepted into the next Android course. :)\n\nIt\'s my goal to learn as much about programming as I can and this course helps me with that.
How comfortable is Austin with lower level programming?
Everything I know has been self taught from years of interest. I\'ve been a computer nerd for as long as I can remember and every day I strive to be better at programming.
How much free time does Austin have?
I often don\'t have time available to check Slack or interact with the community. That doesn\'t mean I don\'t want to be here! My concern is programming every day and learning as much as I can.
How difficult was this challenge for Austin?

This challenge is easy. My interests primarily lie in game development but this is not unfamiliar territory. I also have experience with Visual Studio programs and scripting. Give me a real challenge!
How grateful is Austin to be in this course?

I am very grateful to be here. While not directly, this course has pushed me to learn inheritance, overrides, and many other concepts I was not familiar with on my own. I would like to continue to be pushed so I learn more.
Has Austin already released an app on Google Play?

After a while I felt the beginners course was too slow and holding me back so I worked on my own. I taught myself many concepts such as child fragments, interfaces, SQLite, and applied them to an app I use every day.
Finally, Austin would like to say?
I genuinely hope I move onto the next course. I am here to learn and I do not want to stop. Thank you for taking the time to teach me Android development.
You can press it as much as you like.
Wow! You made it to the end.
I finished my app before seeing the grading rubric. It requires a checkbox. Uh oh!
It also requires I include a text entry field.

I don't have free time available to refactor everything for a CheckBox and an EditText. 

 You can see my Google Play app which stores EditText values in its DB and uses CheckBoxes to handle TimePicker and DatePicker dialogs. It's Noteify by Stellar Software! I am even willing to show you source code.

Thank you for reviewing my challenge app.
Please put me in the next course! :)
